modules.name: resource-group
modules.description: Manages Azure Resource Groups with enterprise standards and tagging
features: Standardized naming convention
Resource locks
Budget alerts
Comprehensive tagging
Multi-environment support
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: virtual-network
modules.description: Manages Azure Virtual Networks with comprehensive networking features
features: Virtual Network with customizable address spaces
Multiple subnets with automatic address calculation
Network Security Groups with default security baselines
Route tables for custom routing
VNet peering for multi-network connectivity
DDoS protection plan integration
Network Watcher flow logs and traffic analytics
Service endpoints and delegations support
Hub-and-spoke architecture examples
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: storage-account
modules.description: Manages Azure Storage Accounts with comprehensive enterprise features including advanced security, monitoring, and data protection
features: Enterprise security with HTTPS-only traffic and minimum TLS version
Network access control with private endpoints and network rules
Advanced data protection with blob versioning, change feed, and point-in-time restore
Lifecycle management for automated tiering and deletion policies
Multiple storage services: blob, file, queue, table with advanced configurations
Customer-managed encryption keys and managed identity support
Static website hosting and monitoring integration
Comprehensive blob, queue, and file share properties
Enterprise tagging and standardized naming conventions
Private endpoints for secure access
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: key-vault
modules.description: Manages Azure Key Vault with comprehensive security features, access policies, secrets, keys, and certificates management for the security layer
features: Secure Key Vault creation with configurable SKU (Standard/Premium)
Support for both RBAC and access policies authorization models
Network security with configurable ACLs and private endpoint support
Secret management with expiration dates and content types
Key management supporting RSA, EC, and HSM-backed keys
Certificate contacts management for notifications
Diagnostic settings for comprehensive logging and monitoring
Security features: purge protection, soft delete, disk encryption
Private networking with DNS zone group integration
Built-in compliance features and validation rules
Comprehensive variable validation and security defaults
Enterprise tagging and governance capabilities
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: az-tf-init
modules.description: Manages Azure infrastructure for Terraform state management including storage account, key vault, and RBAC with enterprise security features
features: Storage Account with blob versioning and soft delete for state files
Optional Key Vault integration for encryption and secrets management
State locking containers for concurrent Terraform operations
RBAC assignments for team-based access control
Network security with IP restrictions and private endpoint support
Log Analytics workspace for monitoring and diagnostics
Comprehensive data protection and retention policies
Standardized naming conventions and enterprise tagging
Multi-environment support with flexible configuration
Advanced security features: purge protection, network ACLs
Automated backend configuration generation
Enterprise compliance and governance capabilities
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: azure-sql-db
modules.description: Manages Azure SQL Database with comprehensive security, monitoring, and backup features following ZRR enterprise standards
features: Security: threat detection, auditing, vulnerability assessment, and transparent data encryption
Performance: configurable SKUs, read scale-out, auto-pause for serverless workloads
Backup & Recovery: short-term and long-term retention policies, geo-redundant backups
Monitoring: built-in auditing and threat detection with configurable retention
Scalability: zone redundancy, read replicas, and flexible sizing options
Compliance: enterprise-grade security controls and governance features
Flexible server configuration: support for existing or referenced SQL Server
Advanced storage options: Local, Zone, Geo, and GeoZone redundancy
Comprehensive variable validation and security defaults
Multiple creation modes: Default, Copy, PointInTimeRestore, Recovery, Restore
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: application-service-plan
modules.description: Manages Azure App Service Plan with comprehensive scaling, performance, monitoring, and alerting features following ZRR enterprise standards
features: Performance tiers: support for all Azure App Service Plan SKUs from Free to Isolated v2
Auto-scaling: configurable auto-scaling rules based on CPU and memory metrics
Zone redundancy: high availability with zone balancing for Premium v2/v3 tiers
Monitoring: built-in diagnostic settings with Log Analytics integration
Alerting: configurable CPU and memory utilization alerts with action groups
Per-site scaling: enable independent scaling for individual web apps
Elastic scaling: support for elastic worker scaling in Premium v3 tiers
Notifications: email and webhook notifications for auto-scaling events
Comprehensive outputs: complete plan information for use by dependent App Services
Advanced example: includes Log Analytics, Application Insights, Action Groups, and NSG
Performance optimization: configurable cooldown periods and threshold management
Enterprise features: comprehensive variable validation and security defaults
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: network-security-group
modules.description: Manages Azure Network Security Groups with configurable security rules, associations, and advanced features like flow logging following ZRR enterprise standards
features: Comprehensive NSG management with custom security rules and validation
Multiple association types: subnet and network interface associations
Resource group management: optionally create or use existing resource groups
Flow logging support: configure flow logs for network traffic analysis
Advanced rule configuration: support for complex security rule definitions
Network segmentation: rules with multiple source and destination prefixes
Protocol support: TCP, UDP, ICMP, ESP, AH, and wildcard protocols
Port range flexibility: single ports, port ranges, or multiple port lists
Service tag integration: support for Azure service tags in rules
Priority management: configurable rule priorities from 100-4096
Comprehensive validation: extensive input validation for all parameters
Enterprise tagging: comprehensive tag management with common and resource-specific tags
Security best practices: default deny rules and principle of least privilege
Advanced examples: network segmentation and enterprise security patterns
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: key-vault-secret
modules.description: Manages Azure Key Vault secrets with enterprise standards compliance, flexible key vault reference, and comprehensive security features
features: Secure Secret Management with Azure Key Vault encryption and storage
Flexible Key Vault Reference supporting both Key Vault ID and name-based lookups
Secret Lifecycle Management with configurable expiration and not-before dates
Content Type Support for better secret organization and metadata
Enterprise Tagging with automatic application of common and resource-specific tags
Comprehensive Validation with input validation for names, values, and date formats
Lifecycle Protection with ignore changes rule to prevent accidental secret updates
Security Best Practices following ZRR enterprise standards and compliance
Multiple Authentication Methods supporting various Key Vault access patterns
Sensitive Value Handling with proper Terraform sensitive value management
Date Format Validation ensuring RFC3339 compliance for all date inputs
Secret Name Validation with Azure Key Vault naming convention compliance
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: storage-file-share
modules.description: Manages Azure Storage File Shares with comprehensive enterprise features including quotas, access control, backup, monitoring, and private networking capabilities
features: File Share Management with configurable quotas and access tiers
Access Control with support for access policies and stored access policies
Protocol Support for SMB and NFS for different use cases
Directory Management with automated creation and management
Backup & Recovery with integrated Azure Backup and configurable retention policies
Monitoring & Alerting with built-in monitoring and quota alerts
Private Networking with optional private endpoint support
Enterprise Features including comprehensive tagging and governance capabilities
Compliance with built-in security defaults and validation rules
Advanced access tier options: Hot, Cool, TransactionOptimized, Premium
Metadata support for file shares and directories
Email notifications for quota alerts and monitoring events
Comprehensive backup policies with daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly retention
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: mysql-flexible-server
modules.description: Manages Azure MySQL Flexible Server with comprehensive enterprise features including high availability, security, backup, monitoring, and networking capabilities
features: High Availability with Zone Redundant and Same Zone options and automatic failover
Advanced Security with customer-managed encryption, private networking, and Azure AD authentication
Comprehensive Backup with configurable retention (1-35 days) and geo-redundant backup support
Enterprise Monitoring with built-in alerting for CPU, memory, and connection metrics
Network Security with private endpoints, subnet delegation, and firewall rules
Database Management with support for multiple databases and custom character sets
Server Configuration with advanced MySQL parameter tuning for production workloads
Identity Management with support for user-assigned managed identities
Maintenance Windows with configurable scheduling for updates and patches
Diagnostic Settings with comprehensive logging to Log Analytics and Storage
Performance Optimization with configurable SKUs, storage IOPS, and availability zones
Enterprise Governance with comprehensive tagging and compliance features
Private DNS Zone integration for secure name resolution
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: storage-container
modules.description: Manages Azure Storage Containers with comprehensive security features, lifecycle management, and enterprise governance capabilities following ZRR standards
features: Container Management with full lifecycle management and configurable access levels
Flexible Storage Account Reference supporting both storage account ID and name-based lookups
Access Control with configurable container access types (private, blob, container) for security compliance
Lifecycle Management with advanced lifecycle rules for automatic blob tiering and deletion policies
Legal Hold Support with enterprise-grade legal hold capabilities for compliance and litigation requirements
Immutability Policies with time-based retention policies for regulatory compliance and data protection
Metadata Management with custom metadata support for enhanced organization and governance
Security Features including comprehensive security controls, access policies, and retention management
Enterprise Tagging with automatic application of common and resource-specific tags following ZRR standards
Validation with extensive input validation ensuring Azure naming conventions and best practices
Monitoring Ready with structured outputs for integration with monitoring and alerting systems
Compliance with built-in features for regulatory compliance including WORM (Write Once, Read Many) capabilities
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: mysql-database
modules.description: Manages Azure MySQL databases with comprehensive enterprise features including database configuration, performance tuning, character sets, collation settings, user management guidance, monitoring, and security
features: Flexible Server Support with compatibility for both MySQL Single Server and MySQL Flexible Server deployments
Database Management with primary and additional databases supporting custom character sets and collations
Character Set Support with full MySQL character set compatibility including UTF-8, Latin, ASCII, and international variants
Collation Management with configurable collation settings for internationalization and sorting requirements
Performance Optimization with configurable MySQL server parameters for production workload tuning
Enterprise Monitoring with built-in alerts for connections, storage usage, and performance metrics integration
Network Security with VNet service endpoints, private networking, and firewall rule management
Audit and Compliance with comprehensive audit logging and slow query logging for regulatory requirements
User Management Guidance with detailed documentation for database user creation and privilege management
Naming Convention Support with ZRR enterprise naming standards and environment-based naming
Comprehensive Validation with extensive input validation for database names, character sets, and configurations
Enterprise Tagging with automatic application of common and resource-specific tags following ZRR standards
Multi-Database Support with ability to create multiple databases with different character sets on the same server
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: mysql-firewall-rule
modules.description: Manages Azure MySQL Firewall Rules with comprehensive security features, IP range management, and enterprise governance capabilities following ZRR standards
features: Dual Server Support compatible with both MySQL Single Server and MySQL Flexible Server deployments
Flexible Server Reference supporting server identification via ID, name-based lookup, or direct flexible server reference
Comprehensive IP Management with support for individual IPs, IP ranges, CIDR blocks, and predefined access patterns
Azure Services Integration with optional access for Azure services using the special 0.0.0.0-0.0.0.0 rule
Office and Developer Access with predefined variables for common access scenarios including office IPs and developer workstations
Application Network Access with support for application subnet CIDR blocks and comprehensive validation
Security Validation with comprehensive IP address validation, range checking, and environment-specific controls
Enterprise Governance including compliance tags, justification requirements, and monitoring capabilities
Environment-Aware Configuration with environment-specific validation and rule naming conventions
Monitoring Ready with built-in support for monitoring and alerting on firewall rule changes
Rule Limit Management with configurable limits to prevent Azure service limits from being exceeded
Comprehensive Outputs providing detailed information about created rules, security configuration, and compliance status
Advanced Access Patterns supporting office networks, developer workstations, application tiers, and partner networks
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: dns-zone
modules.description: Manages Azure DNS Zones with comprehensive enterprise features including advanced record management, delegation support, DNSSEC capabilities, virtual network integration, and monitoring
features: Complete DNS Record Support with A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, SRV, PTR records and comprehensive validation
DNS Delegation with automated delegation setup and parent zone NS record creation
Virtual Network Integration with private DNS zone linking and auto-registration capabilities
Enterprise Monitoring with query volume and record count alerting integrated with Azure Monitor
DNSSEC Support with zone signing capabilities for enhanced security and authentication
Flexible Naming with ZRR naming convention support and environment-based domain naming
Record Management with bulk record creation, comprehensive validation, and TTL optimization
Parent Zone Integration with seamless delegation and parent zone verification
Auto-Registration with VM record auto-registration in private DNS zones
Resource Tagging with comprehensive tagging strategy for resource management and governance
SOA Configuration with custom SOA record configuration for zone authority management
Multi-Environment Support with environment-specific domain suffix and naming patterns
Security Features with DNSSEC key rollover management and comprehensive security controls
Email Security with built-in support for SPF, DKIM, and DMARC record configuration
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: dns-record
modules.description: Manages Azure DNS records with enterprise-grade features including monitoring, compliance, security controls, and lifecycle management for both public and private zones
features: Dual Zone Support with both public and private DNS zones for complete network coverage
Comprehensive Record Types supporting A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, NS, TXT, SRV, CAA records with full validation
Enterprise Governance with monitoring, compliance tracking, and security controls following ZRR standards
Flexible Zone Reference supporting zone ID, name-based lookup, and direct zone reference patterns
Advanced Validation with strict format checking, forbidden values, and record count limits
MX Record Management with priority-based mail exchange configuration and validation
SRV Record Support for service discovery with priority, weight, port, and target configuration
Lifecycle Management with backup, approval workflows, and scheduled update capabilities
Security Controls including access restrictions, change protection, and audit logging
Monitoring Integration with health checks, alerting, and performance tracking
Compliance Framework with multi-framework support (SOX, PCI-DSS, ISO27001, GDPR, HIPAA)
TTL Optimization with configurable time-to-live settings for different use cases
Enterprise Tagging with comprehensive tag management and governance capabilities
Network Security with encrypted transport and access control mechanisms
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: application-insights
modules.description: Manages Azure Application Insights with comprehensive monitoring, alerting, analytics, and enterprise governance features following ZRR standards
features: Enterprise Application Performance Monitoring with comprehensive telemetry collection and analysis
Multi-Region Web Tests for availability monitoring with ping and multistep test support
Advanced Alerting with custom metric alerts, smart detection, and severity-based routing
AI-Powered Smart Detection with anomaly detection and automated notifications
Analytics Items including saved queries, KQL functions, and business intelligence capabilities
API Key Management for external system integrations and programmatic access
Operational Dashboards with workbook templates for performance and error monitoring
Continuous Export for long-term data retention and compliance requirements
Enterprise Governance with SOX, PCI-DSS, HIPAA, GDPR, ISO27001, SOC2 compliance support
Data Governance with PII detection, data masking, and classification capabilities
Advanced Security with Azure AD authentication, IP masking, and access controls
Comprehensive Variable Validation with extensive input validation and security defaults
Integration Tests using Terratest framework for enterprise-grade testing
Multiple Examples including basic monitoring and advanced enterprise configurations
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team

modules.name: container-instance
modules.description: Manages Azure Container Instance with comprehensive enterprise features including multi-container support, advanced networking, monitoring, and security capabilities following ZRR standards
features: Multi-Container Support with up to 60 containers per group with flexible resource allocation
Advanced Networking with public, private, and VNet integration for secure deployments
Container Registry Integration with Azure Container Registry and external registry authentication
Health Monitoring with liveness and readiness probes for application health verification
Enterprise Monitoring with Log Analytics integration and configurable metric alerts
Managed Identity Support with system-assigned and user-assigned identity management
DNS Configuration with custom DNS settings and automatic FQDN assignment
Security Features including secure environment variables and network isolation
Restart Policies with configurable restart behavior for different deployment scenarios
OS Support for both Linux and Windows containers with appropriate configurations
Comprehensive Tagging with automatic application of common and resource-specific tags
Variable Validation with extensive input validation ensuring Azure naming conventions
Test Coverage with comprehensive unit and integration tests using Terratest
Enterprise Governance with compliance features and comprehensive monitoring capabilities
modules.author: ZRR Platform Team
